glsa.title: MoinMoin: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been reported in MoinMoin, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MoinMoin. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, overwrite arbitrary files, or conduct Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All MoinMoin users should upgrade to the latest version:
